filter_serialized_nodes()[source]¶

Filter out nodes that are already in the stage.

If parent of copied node is about to be pasted child will be skipped to avoid duplication.

  • Set cached path to current.

  • destination_path (pathlib.PurePosixPath | str) – target path

Raises:

  • ValueError – source_path is not absolute

  • ValueError – destination_path is not absolute

relative path
